Subject: Apocalypse Now! ((Unicron, Minions)) --> Anyone with a comm unit
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=140463140
X-Yahoo-Profile: warriorazure

OOC: Robo, Airly, this is your cue to take a squad and bash some 
bolts!

Bic:

Unicron's propulsors came to a step as he settled in the Moon's 
orbit. He stood there, watching the energon-bloated jewel that was 
Earth. He zoomed his malevolent attention on the three Cybertronian 
bases and decided that these were the objectives. A low roar arose 
as he began to speak. His voice would be transmitted all over the 
planet.

Unicron: I claim this planet as mine. Any Transformer on it will be 
destroyed unless they choose to become my servants. Also, if you 
part with the Matrix, I may spare your spark.

The Transmission ended abruptly. The Chaos Bringer turned to his 
many Minions.

Unicron: We will attack in waves. Kill all you find, unless they 
offer their alliegeance. Sky-Eye, find Bloodblade.

The first squad, the Flaming Eye of Morgoth (hint hint!), left on 
that instant for Predacon base. They were Firewhip, Klash, 
Crumblefish, Sky-Eye and the big Ragebomber. They would be there 
soon...
